import React from 'react' import { Api } from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' const UserAddressDetail = ({ open }) => { const formclose = (e) => { const reqpayload = { "first_name": "jack", "last_name": "kumar", "email": "jack215@yopmail.com", "phone": 8826055628, "postcode": 121005, "street": "rajender chowk", "flat_no": "1234", "landmark": "near GIDC", "country": "5ae8284db37516a75ac0aada", "state": "5ae83bedb37516a75ac0ab25", "city": "Delhi", } Api.post(endPoints.ADD_USER_ADDRESS, reqpayload).then((res) => { if (res.data.message) { Api.post(endPoints.GET_USER_ADDRESS).then((res) => console.log("getuseraddressss", res)).catch((err) => console.log(err)) } } ).catch((err) => console.log(err)) open(false) } console.log(open) return (<>
Shipping
Coupon
View Available Coupon
Payment Option
) } export default UserAddressDetail
